messages.title: Cleaning Up Politics
messages.content: Peter Jones, Shadow MP for Milton Keynes South, is supporting Nick Clegg's campaign to clean up politics. Details of MPs' expenses and the call for a fairer political system.

messages.title: More Money for Schools
messages.content: The Liberal Democrat council spends over £130 million every year building new schools and refurbishing older ones, contributing to the improvement for Milton Keynes' children.

messages.title: Liberal Democrats - Getting the Most for Your Money
messages.content: Figures show residents of Liberal Democrat run Milton Keynes pay over £870 less in council tax than most other places. Also highlights savings and efficiency improvements.

messages.title: Three Things To Remember
messages.content: Stuart Burke and the Focus Team work hard all year round. You only hear from the Conservatives at election time. Labour cannot win in Emerson Valley ward.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investment of over £130 million in building new schools and refurbishing older ones.
Support for Nick Clegg's campaign to clean up politics with more transparency in MPs' expenses.
Promises of lower council tax and efficient use of public funds.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour cannot win in Emerson Valley ward.

issues.economy: Residents of Liberal Democrat run Milton Keynes pay over £870 less in council tax than most other places. Commitment to low council tax and efficient public spending.
issues.education: The Liberal Democrat council spends over £130 million on schools each year, aiming for smaller classes and better GCSE results.
issues.governance: Support for Nick Clegg's campaign to a cleaner, fairer political system with more transparent MPs' expenses.
issues.socialWelfare: Committed to supporting older people and young people with practical sheltered housing and excellent youth services.

images.caption: Councillor Stuart Burke alongside text related to Liberal Democrat promises.
